subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: As the Dodgers edge toward the playoffs, grousing among outfielders Andre Ethier, Carl Crawford, Matt Kemp, Scott Van Slyke, Yasiel Puig and Joc Pederson has subsided.
snippet: As the Dodgers edge toward the playoffs, grousing among outfielders Andre Ethier, Carl Crawford, Matt Kemp, Scott Van Slyke, Yasiel Puig and Joc Pederson has subsided.
